definitions.text: perennial subshrub of Tenerife having leaves in rosettes resembling pinwheels
a wheel that has numerous pins that are set at right angles to its rim
examples: he spun the pinwheel and it stopped with the pointer on `Go'

definitions.text: a toy consisting of vanes of colored paper or plastic that is pinned to a stick and spins when it is pointed into the wind
a circular firework that spins round and round emitting colored fire
